tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: God causes such events to take place in the present world as make the occurrence of Doomsday understandable in advance. ’ At that time, the Prophet told the people that just as the moon had broken into pieces, the world would also break into pieces and then a new world would be built

tafsirQuiz.question: What deeper meaning is explained in this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The people of ‘Ad merited divine retribution, so God unleashed a hurricane which made it difficult for them to remain upright. The winds lifted them and tossed them about violently and waves dashed them against the trees

tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Pharaoh was a very powerful ruler of his time, but on rejecting the truth he became valueless in the eyes of God. In this world, a man standing out against the Truth renders himself weak

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: For those who refused to accept the Prophet Muhammad, there was a lesson in the fatal incidents which befell those who rejected the earlier prophets. In spite of clear signs, every community has considered itself safe from God’s ire and therefore exempt from religious obligations
